title: Boon: Circle Of Healing
desc:
Post 1842
- Activates a Dull Totem, if there is one, turning it into a Boon Totem.
While Active:
- Nobody can be inflicted with **Gloom** while this Boon is active.
- The player of the Boon may skip their turn to Heal all **Injuries** and remove all **Suffocate.**
